task.title: Add JSONL ledger to relay-pty for crash recovery and durability

events.content: Use JSONL instead of SQLite for relay-pty ledger: Use JSONL instead of SQLite for relay-pty ledger

raw.question: Use JSONL instead of SQLite for relay-pty ledger
raw.chosen: Use JSONL instead of SQLite for relay-pty ledger
raw.reasoning: JSONL is simpler than SQLite, no native dependencies, append-only is sufficient for this use case, easy to debug/inspect, and matches existing JSONL patterns in the codebase

events.content: Abandoned: Deferring implementation - bead agent-relay-547 created for future work
